title: 7 Easy Steps to Take a Really Long Screenshot on iPhone

steps.title: Navigate to the page you want to capture.
steps.content: Navigate to the page you want to capture. You can take a long screenshot of a webpage, document, email, or more. If you want to record your screen , you'll need to use the Screen Recording app. Be sure to update your iPhone .

steps.title: Press the Power button and the Volume up button at the same time.
steps.content: Press the Power button and the Volume up button at the same time. This will take a screenshot of your screen. [1] X Research source The Power button can be found on the right side of your iPhone while the Volume up button can be found on the left side. If your iPhone has a Home button, press the Home button and Power button at the same time. The Power button can be found on the right side of your iPhone while the Home button is the circular button below your screen.

steps.title: Tap the screenshot icon in the bottom-left corner.
steps.content: Tap the screenshot icon in the bottom-left corner. This will bring up the screenshot editing screen. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the Full Page tab.
steps.content: Tap the Full Page tab. This can be found underneath the row of icons at the top, next to the Screen tab. [3] X Research source You will see the length of the page and its contents on the right side. Tap and drag the rectangle to navigate up and down the page. If you don't see the Full Page option, the page you're trying to save may not be long enough.

steps.title: Edit your Full Page screenshot.
steps.content: Edit your Full Page screenshot. You can tap the crop icon next to Done to crop your screenshot. Drag up from the top, bottom, or side to crop your screenshot. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Done.
steps.content: Tap Done . A pop-up menu will open. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Save to Photos.
steps.content: Tap Save to Photos . This will save your Full Page screenshot to your Camera Roll in the Photos app. [6] X Research source You can also select Save PDF to Files to store the screenshot in your Files app, Copy and Delete to paste the screenshot elsewhere, or Delete Screenshot to start over. If you want to share your Full Page screenshot, tap the Share icon in the top-right corner. You can use AirDrop, send an email , use Messages, and more to share your screenshot. You can also transfer the photos to your computer . The screenshot will be sent as a PDF document. Rename your PDF document by tapping Rename underneath the document title. Enter the new name, then tap Submit .
